definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be exposed, bare (akin to [[עָרָה]], [[ערר]]; Ar. 9awrah;un = pudenda);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[עֶרְיׇה תֵעוֹר קַשְׁתֶָּךְ]] Hb Hab 3:9 into nakedness (i.e. utterly) is thy bow laid bare, made ready; We prop. [[עוֹרֵר תְּעוֹרֵר]] (cf. 2Sa 23:18, I. [[עור]]

definitions.title: Pō‘l.
definitions.body: ), and so Now [from √ [[ערר]], lay bare] thou layest, etc.
